monogr.title: Contributions to the Apocryphal Literature of the New Testament, Collected and Edited from Syriac Manuscripts in the British Museum, with an English Translation and Notes

biblStruct.note: The Protevangelium Jacobi, or, The history of the birth of Our Lord and of the Virgin Mary. The Gospel of Thomas the Israelite, or, Of the infancy of Our Lord. The letters of Herod and Pilate. The history of the last days and death of Virgin Mary ... which is also called the Transitus, Assumptio ... Beatae Virginis. The obsequies of the Holy Virgin.

body.bibl: Wright, William. Contributions to the Apocryphal Literature of the New Testament, Collected and Edited from Syriac Manuscripts in the British Museum, with an English Translation and Notes. London: Williams and Norgate, 1865.

William Wright, Contributions to the Apocryphal Literature of the New Testament, Collected and Edited from Syriac Manuscripts in the British Museum, with an English Translation and Notes (London: Williams and Norgate, 1865).
